name: A Locket Forgotten
description:
A Locket Forgotten is a short puzzle horror game where use you navigate an abandoned facility with your paintball gun. Playtime is expected to be between thirty minutes to one hour to complete.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Control - Crouch

E - Interact

Left Click - Shoot

WARNING

This game contains rapidly flashing lights. These can be disabled on the main menu under game options.
